price: 99. Dan dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Sesungguhnya aku harus pergi (menghadap) kepada Tuhanku,  Dia akan memberi petunjuk kepadaku.*(732)
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
footnotes: *732). Nabi Ibrahim -'alaihissalām- pergi ke suatu negeri untuk dapat menyembah Allah dan berdakwah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
